page.title: 03A day in Kevin's life.
page.content: I am 9. A typical day begins at 7.30 when my Mum comes and wakes me up. I get dressed and have my breakfast. At 8.30 I go to school. At 8.55 we go in for lessons. We do Maths or English and then at 10.45 we go out to play. We play Bull-Dog or ball-tigs and cricket. Then we do some more work and at 12.00 we go for dinner. At 1.10 we might do art and craft until 2.30. Then we clear up and have a story. At 3.40 we go home and I have my tea and play out with my friend, Craig. I go to bed at 8.30. At weekends I sometimes play rugby league for Featherstone Travellers or go to the gymnastics club in Wakefield.
